Detailed Description

Generic graph data structure allowing both factor and region graphs

LD MyGraph::getMsg ( NodePtr  parent,
NodePtr  child,
StatePtr  jointState,
bool  forwardMsg = true 
)

function that returns the message from child->parent when childToParentMsg is true else returns parent->child reverse edge message. jointState gives the child joint state
